 rm(list=ls())
 Fx <- function(t) 3*sin(t)*cos(t)-4*sin(t)+cos(t)
 Dx <- function(t) -sin(t) -4*cos(t) -3*cos(2*t)
 Hx <- function(t) t - (Fx(t)/Dx(t))
 
 newton <- function(a,b) 
 {
   
   
   if((Fx(a)-a)*(Fx(b)-b)<0)
   {
     t<-seq(a,b,0.01)
     plot(t,Fx(t),type="l",col="red")
     abline(h=0,col="blue")
      
     
     t<-0
     r<-Hx(t)
     i<-0
     while (Fx(r) != 0 ) 
     {    
       
       error<-abs(Fx(t)/Dx(t))
       
       if(error >  1.e-4)
         t<-r
       else break
       r<-Hx(t)  
       
       text(t,0,i,cex=0.8,col="blue")
      
       i<-i+1
       
       cat("I=",i,"\tF(t) =",Fx(t),"\tT=",signif(t, digits = 4),"\tE=",error,"\n")
     }
     
   }
   else
   {
     cat("No tiene raíz la funcion en ese intervalo.\n")
   }
   
 }
 
 newton(0,pi/4)
